WhatIsOprek.title: What Is Android Modding?
WhatIsOprek.description: Android modding is the process of modifying your Android device beyond factory limitations. From unlocking the bootloader, gaining root access, to replacing the operating system with a custom ROM — all aimed at giving you full control over the device you own.
WhatIsOprek.highlight: Modding isn't just technical. It's about freedom.
